Desc.entry: Sally Brown's subject is: Percy Grainger, The Man and his Music Today. Offers 3 introductory displays in music and words: "The Universal Percy Grainger", a general introduction to the scope of his work; "Percy Grainger - 'Wayside Gardener' and Fore-runner of Musical Democracy " which gives glimpses of the man in his life and work in between items of this music; "Come Into The Garden", relating his work to the musical scenes in and around Sheffield and the world. Each talk consists of 2 sections of 1 hour duration.
